front.title: Internet Protocol Encapsulation of AX.25 Frames

abstract.t: This document describes a method for the encapsulation of AX.25 Link Access Protocol for Amateur Packet Radio frames within IPv4 and IPv6 packets. Obsoletes RFC1226. Note Comments are solicited and should be addressed to the author(s). The sources for this draft are at: https://github.com/irl/draft-rfc1226-bis
